info.name: Slack Dark Fixed
info.description: Dark blue theme for slack. Use the 'ochin' sidebar theme built in Slack for best results.
info.additionalInfo:
Sourced on github here: https://github.com/cold12/Stylish-Dark-Slack

UPDATE 2015-11-13
 - Changes from toddhalfpenny

UPDATE 2015-08-18
 - Fix mention background

UPDATE 2015-08-17
 - Fix day divider & plus button styles

data.title: One last issue: Hovering over comments uses a white background.
